PackageOracle.name: DA_MODEM_ACCESS
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_MODEM_ACCESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.385862000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) return NUMBER;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_modem_access;

body.name: DA_MODEM_ACCESS
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_MODEM_ACCESS
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.00.396833000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_access.add(fx), parms=' || modem_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || max_sust_download_speed_num || '|' || max_sust_upload_speed_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_access a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.max_sust_download_speed_num
,a.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_id.NEXTVAL
,add.modem_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,add.max_sust_download_speed_num
,add.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.modem_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_access.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_access.add, parms=' || modem_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || max_sust_download_speed_num || '|' || max_sust_upload_speed_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_access a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.max_sust_download_speed_num
,a.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_modem_id.NEXTVAL
,add.modem_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,add.max_sust_download_speed_num
,add.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_access.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,modem_mac_address_val IN VARCHAR2
,equip_prod_inst_id IN NUMBER
,max_sust_download_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,max_sust_upload_speed_num IN VARCHAR2
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_access.add, parms=' || modem_id || '|' || modem_mac_address_val || '|' || equip_prod_inst_id || '|' || max_sust_download_speed_num || '|' || max_sust_upload_speed_num || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_modem_access a
(
a.modem_id
,a.modem_mac_address_val
,a.equip_prod_inst_id
,a.max_sust_download_speed_num
,a.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.modem_id
,add.modem_mac_address_val
,add.equip_prod_inst_id
,add.max_sust_download_speed_num
,add.max_sust_upload_speed_num
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_access.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,modem_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_modem_access.del, parms=' || modem_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_modem_access a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.modem_id = del.modem_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_modem_access.del');

END del;

END da_modem_access;
